name: demo-app
title: Demo App
description: App Framework Demo App - iOS and Android Apps with HTML & JavaScript - develop, build and deploy - free and open source!

scripts.database: cd node_modules && node app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase && cd .bin && firebase deploy --only database && cd ../ && node app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.storage: cd node_modules && node app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase && cd .bin && firebase deploy --only storage && cd ../ && node app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.hosting: cd node_modules && node app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase && cd .bin && firebase deploy --only hosting && cd ../ && node app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.backup: cd node_modules && node app-framework/scripts/prepare-firebase && cd .bin && firebase database:get / >"database-backup.json" && cd ../ && node app-framework/scripts/cleanup-firebase
